title: An Act to improve enforcement of environmental quality

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Day of Stoneham (by request), a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1647) of Vincent Lawrence Dixon relative to the enforcement of laws and legal regulations related to public health, environmental pollution, and environmental justice.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/25/2025 from 10:00 AM-05:00 PM in A-2
